metadata.title: CVE-2023-2931 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in PDF in Google Chrome prior to 114.0.5735.90 allowed aremote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted PDFfile. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
